ratings.comment: Best prof I've had at UW! The language is tough, but Salah made it easy to learn. His enthusiasm, even via Zoom, keeps me going. Willing to give students second chances. Encourages participation and kindly corrects mistakes. You have to put the work in bc it's a 5-credit language class, but it's definitely worth it!

Salah is the BEST teacher I've ever had in my life in any subject. He is incredibly funny, bubbly, & talented in teaching foreign languages. He lights up the room and gets everyone excited to be there and learn, class is SO fun, made the 5 days a week more than bearable. By far UW's best Arabic teacher, seriously missing out if you don't have him.

I was fortunate enough to have Salah for two semester of Arabic at Madison and cannot say enough good things. He is an incredibly kind and enthusiastic person and a gifted teacher. He's also always willing to go the extra mile to write letters of recommendation and keep in touch. It's a privilege to have been his student.
He is the most experienced teacher ever. His class is the best
You will never feel bored or sleepy in his classes. He is super active and passionate about teaching. He is the BEST
Salah is the best teacher I have ever had in my entire life. He is smart, caring and very very very encouraging.

Salah is the best professor I have had at UW Madison, he is kind-hearted, highly respected by his students and made learning Arabic incredibly enjoyable. I was happy to get up at 8 a.m. every morning to go to his class.

Salah is PHENOMENAL. He is an amazing teacher who is 110% dedicated to the success of his students. He is very approachable and fair. Salah's enthusiasm for teaching is palpable. The classroom environment is relaxed and fun, while simultaneously being dedicated to learning Arabic and experiencing the Arabic culture.
Thumbs up

Most amazing teacher ever. He cares so much about his students it genuinely felt like we were apart of his family, loved his class. Everything assigned is reasonable and he is always willing to help you. The class was everyday but it did not feel like it. Time passed so fast, I can't recommend him enough!

Salah is, hands down, the best instructor I have ever had at Madison. He is warm and intelligent and genuinely cares about our well being. He is able to teach is copious amounts of material while making it seem effortless and interesting. I can never believe how fast class flies by. Salah deserves all the awards in the world.
Salah's passion for teaching and helping me speak Arabic was great. I was never scared of sounding like an idiot or like I didn't know what I was doing.
Salah always made the class so interesting and fun.  I enjoyed coming to class everyday because of his upbeat spirit. I will definitely miss him because he believed  in me as a student.
Great teacher
Salah is one of, if not the best professor I've had at UW and I just can't speak highly enough of his enthusiasm and love for teaching.

Salah is my favorite teacher ever. Fun teacher and I felt comfortable approaching him with question and concerns. I was never afraid to ask a question because I knew hed explain it to my understanding and never make me feel stupid. , He is AWESOME
Great instructor
Salah is very effective in his teaching. Not many TAs are able to stimulate the students to the extent Salah does, so he provides a great environment to learn.
He will continue to explain things until you understand the information. He makes class interesting and exciting. I enjoy coming to class everyday. Thanks for doing a great job
Teacher Salah is creative, approachable and very knowledgeable. take a class with him and your life will change forever

He is a great teacher. I started loving Arabic language and culture because of him. He is very smart and talented teacher. He really cares about his students and does the impossible to make them succeed. I highly recommend taking a class with him. Hee is the best ever
